# Login Api Documentation

## Login Admins

Login to the admin panel to control the system.

- **Endpoint:** `/login_admin.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `email` | String | Email address of the admin. |
| `password` | String | Password for the admin. |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "email": "john.doe@example.com",
  "password": "StrongPassword123",
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{
    "status": "Success",
    "admin": {
        "a_id": 1,
        "a_first_name": "Mohammed",
        "a_last_name": "El Shora",
        "a_email": "elshora@gmail.com",
        "a_password": "$2y$10$Xx9juMyB.B8pHcQvjoPuZOT7DtBkz2Pqii6TiQEG9TUvbpPEva6m6",
        "a_verified_code": null,//type string
        "a_last_login": "2024-01-25 15:49:11",
        "a_create_at": "2024-01-23 04:56:39"
    }
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 401)**  
    When the email is incorrect
    

``` json
{
 "status": "Failure",
 "code": 401,
 "type":"auth-error",
 "message": "The email you entered does not exist"
 }

 ```

or When the password is incorrect

``` json
  {  
   "status": "Failure",  
   "code": 401,  
   "type":"auth-error",
   "message": "Error in password"  
  }

 ```

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)**  
    You have to fill email and password .. if you don't fill it or when you forgot one of the post body
    

``` json
 {  
 "status": "Failure",  
 "code": 400,  
 "type":"post-error",
 "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"  
 }

 ```

# Send admin verify code Api Documentation

## Send verify code for admins By admin email

Send verify code for admin.

- **Endpoint:** `/send_admin_verify_code.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `email` | String | The email address of the admin. |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "email": "elshora@gmail.com"
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{
    "status": "Success",
    "admin": {
        "a_id": 1,
        "a_first_name": "Mohammed",
        "a_last_name": "El Shora",
        "a_email": "elshora@gmail.com",
        "a_password": "$2y$10$Xx9juMyB.B8pHcQvjoPuZOT7DtBkz2Pqii6TiQEG9TUvbpPEva6m6",
        "a_verified_code": "541234", // not be null
        "a_last_login": "2024-01-26 06:57:16",
        "a_create_at": "2024-01-23 04:56:39"
    }
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 401)**  
    When the email is not exist in database
    

``` json
{
 "status": "Failure",
 "code": 401,
 "type":"auth-error",
 "message": "The email you entered does not exist"
 }

 ```

Or you have to fill `email` .. if you don't fill it or when you forgot it

``` json
 {  
 "status": "Failure",  
 "code": 400,  
 "type":"post-error",
 "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"  
 }

 ```

# Check Admin verify code Api Documentation

## Check verify code for admins By admin id

Check verify code for admin.

- **Endpoint:** `/check_admin_verify_code.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `adminId` | int | The id of the admin. |
| `code` | String | The code that was sent to the admin. |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "adminId": 1,
  "password": "123456",
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{
    "status": "Success",
    "admin": {
        "a_id": 1,
        "a_first_name": "Mohammed",
        "a_last_name": "El Shora",
        "a_email": "elshora@gmail.com",
        "a_password": "$2y$10$Xx9juMyB.B8pHcQvjoPuZOT7DtBkz2Pqii6TiQEG9TUvbpPEva6m6",
        "a_verified_code": null,// always null
        "a_last_login": "2024-01-25 15:49:11",
        "a_create_at": "2024-01-23 04:56:39"
    }
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 401)**  
    When the id is not exist in database
    

``` json
{
 "status": "Failure",
 "code": 401,
 "type":"auth-error",
 "message": "The adminId you entered does not exist"
 }

 ```

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)**  
    When the `code` is incorrect
    

``` json
  {  
   "status": "Failure",  
   "code": 400,  
   "type":"invalid-code-error",
   "message": "Invalid verification code"  
  }

 ```

Or you have to fill `adminId` and `code` .. if you don't fill them or when you forgot one of the post body

``` json
 {  
 "status": "Failure",  
 "code": 400,  
 "type":"post-error",
 "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"  
 }

 ```

# Admin New Password Api Documentation

## Create a New password

Creates a new pass to the Admin.

- **Endpoint:** `/admin_new_password.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `adminId` | int | The Id of the admin. |
| `newPassword` | String | Password for the admin. Minimum length: 8 chars. invalid the last password |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "adminId": "1",
  "newPassword": "StrongPassword123"
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{
    "status": "Success",
    "admin": {
        "a_id": 1,
        "a_first_name": "Mohammed",
        "a_last_name": "El Shora",
        "a_email": "elshora@gmail.com",
        "a_password": "$2y$10$9b6PVcuWrgJATyrKx4OH7ergNHNgEHRVtt3dOvRKh9g2rZvTr99B.",
        "a_verified_code": null,
        "a_last_login": "2024-01-26 06:57:16",
        "a_create_at": "2024-01-23 04:56:39"
    }
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 409)**  
    When the adminId is not exist in database
    
    ``` json
                          {
                          "status": "Failure",
                          "code": 409,
                          "type":"auth-error",
                          "message": "The adminId you entered does not exist"
                          }
    
     ```
    
- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)** When the length of the password is lesser than 8
    
    ``` json
                      {
                      "status": "Failure",
                      "code": 400,
                      "type":"edit-error",
                      "message": "The password is very weak"
                      }
    
     ```
    

When the new password is the same of last password

``` json
{
  "status": "Failure",
  "code": 400,
  "type":"edit-error",
  "message": "You can't use the same previous password"
}

 ```

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)** You have to fill all posts body .. if you don't fill it or when you forgot one of the post body
    
    ``` json
            {
            "status": "Failure",
            "code": 400,
            "type":"post-error",
            "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"
            }
    
     ```

# changename Api Documentation

## change name of user by admin of app

change the first name and last name of user.

- **Endpoint:** `/changename.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `userId` | int | The Id of the user. |
| `new_first_name` | String | the new first name |
| `new_last_name` | String | the new last name |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "userId": "45",
  "new_first_name": "ali"
  "new_last_name": "elhamoli"
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{
    "status": "Success",
    "user": [
        {
            "user_id": 45,
            "user_email": "mre9743@gmail.com",
            "user_first_name": "ali",
            "user_last_name": "alhamoli",
            "user_password": "$2y$10$ExlqpJ7wW1NdMncnYu2sQOSZa4V4rgBcqB6TJNzD6ZWOroQYCDJ9i",
            "user_provider": "email_password",
            "user_lastlogin": "2024-02-27 20:56:37",
            "user_createdat": "2024-02-13 22:21:19",
            "user_image": null,
            "user_type": "personal",
            "user_status": "active",
            "user_status_message": null
        }
    ]
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)** You have to fill all posts body .. if you don't fill it or when you forgot one of the post body
    

``` json
{
  "status": "Failure",
  "code": 400,
  "type":"post-error",
  "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"
}

 ```

# changepassword Api Documentation

## change password of user by admin of app

- **Endpoint:** `/changepassword.php`
- **Method:** `POST`
- **Request Format:** JSON
    

### Request Parameters

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `userId` | int | The Id of the user. |
| `new_password` | String | the new pass |

### Request Example

``` json
{
  "userId": "45",
  "new_password": "12345678"
}

 ```

### Response Format

#### In Success

``` json
{
    "status": "Success",
    "user": [
        {
            "user_id": 42,
            "user_email": "elshoram974@gmail.com",
            "user_first_name": "Mohammed",
            "user_last_name": "El Shora",
            "user_password": "$2y$10$iMZkcd.KYLeUNN9INKlLTOFFlUJS7PTpVcRz1bea9Em8FxByANZ.q",
            "user_provider": "email_password",
            "user_lastlogin": "2024-03-14 16:00:25",
            "user_createdat": "2024-02-01 01:53:48",
            "user_image": null,
            "user_type": "personal",
            "user_status": "active",
            "user_status_message": null
        }
    ]
}

 ```

#### In Error

- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 401)**  
    this error happen becouse the new pass must be larger than or eqaul 8 chars.
    
    ``` json
          {
          "status": "Failure",
          "code": 401,
          "type":"authentication_error",
          "message": "Password must be at least 8 characters long"
          }
    
     ```
    
- **Error Response (HTTP Status Code: 400)** You have to fill all posts body .. if you don't fill it or when you forgot one of the post body
    

``` json
{
  "status": "Failure",
  "code": 400,
  "type":"post-error",
  "message": "You can't make 'postBodyName' empty. 'postBodyName': postBodyNameData"
}

 ```
